title: Live-Chat
description: A real-time chat application with Node.js and WebSockets using Socket.IO for communication. It features message persistence via SQLite, allowing users to interact in real-time.

title: Empressaria
description: Empressaria is an e-commerce website designed for efficient product browsing. It loads a product catalog dynamically from a JSON file without requiring a database.

title: Korean Character Recognition with AI
description: A machine learning project utilizing Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) to recognize Korean Hangul characters from images.

title: Automatic MongoDB Replica Set Setup with Shell Script
description: A shell script designed to automatically configure a MongoDB replica set across three nodes. This script sets up the configuration, connects the nodes, and ensures proper synchronization of the replica set members.
